attributes.action: Synchronise the Tax Disc, Insurance and MOT checks to make getting taxed easier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get the post office to accept copies of insurance documents, including e-mail and fax versions so that when you buy a new car without tax you are not stuck with it off road for up to a month waiting for the documents to show up so you can get it taxed.  Surely with IT the way it is now all this paper is redundant anyway?
